refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o STKBlowHole.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ipch = p4 kv1 = p7 ;stiffness of reed kv3 line p5, p3, p6 ;state of tonehole
asig STKBlowHole cpspch(ipch), 1, 2, kv1, 4, 100, 11, kv3, 1, 10, 128, 100 outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 4 10.00 20 127 100 i 1 + 7 6.09 120 0 10 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
